reference.title: Ant parameters: JavaHelp transformation
reference.shortdesc: Certain parameters are specific to the JavaHelp transformation.

plentry.pd: Specifies the name of the ditamap file for a JavaHelp project.What does this mean? How does this differ from the args.input parameter? Or should this read "Specifies the name of the JavaHelp map file?

Specifies the name of the file containing the TOC in your JavaHelp output. Default value is the name of the ditamap file for your projectI assume that the first sentence means "Specifies the name of the JavaHelp TOC file." But what does the second sentence mean? That the default value for the args.javahelp.toc parameter is the name of the master DITA map? Or that the default value for the args.javahelp.toc parameter is the value of the args.javahelp.map parameter?.
